moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 c5 3. e3 cxd4 4. exd4 d5: Trying to isolate the h7 pawn and open up another rank...
Was thinking of dropping queen to c3 as the diagonal to the king would be full of my pieces, handy for discovered checks...
moves.27... Rfh8: Good square to hold black in at the back
moves.28. Rd6 Qa4: Great move to go around the back
moves.29. Qc3: R x d5 would lose after Qd1, so I took 15 minutes to go to where I had planned 2 moves previously...
moves.29... Qxd4+: I thought I was gone here with the Nf3 to follow up....
moves.30. Qxd4: But the diagonal was useful after all...
